channel.title: Kubernetes on Green Mojito in technology

item.title: Kubernetes from scratch for developers
item.description: Trying to explain Kubernetes(k8s), I bring here a guide about how to make a very fruitful study of it. These thoughts are from a software developer perspective and well explained in Kubernetes(k8s) documentation. An advice before beginning the study of k8s: You should study in-depth about any application container engine, I suggest docker but there are many others like rkt, runc or any other that follows OCI specifications. You will find here interesting resources that will help in your journey : The documentation site can guide you with several examples and practical tasks.
